content.raw:
I think this call is a little confusing. Imagine a duration of 3600 seconds.

I would expect that Time::FormattedString(false, false, false, false, true, true) would look like this: "3600.000". 
However it looks like it comes out as "00.000", because the days, hours, minutes are always removed.

check out my branch format_time_seconds for this failing test.
